A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was super hyped\, bought some tickets for Saturday with some friends and then went to see it today\, alone. Basically couldn't wait. 
Left the cinema halfway through. Before deciding to do that I mocked some of the bad user reviews with my girlfriend\, thinking that it's unwarranted. Little did i know. The movie starts with some of the worst and most contrived scenes I've ever seen. And then carries on on the same note. It feels like a bad quality fan film on a really big budget.
Shit. I wonder how many critics disney paid off so that it could have that critic score... 
Will probably pirate the next one just so i see how shit it is and not encourage this kind of cheap film making. The second part of the hobbit is a masterpiece compared to this. Almost as bad as suicide squad.
